DataElement.preferredName: Smoking History Daily Cigarette Consumption Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no response to a question that asks if the participant/subject has smoked a quantity of cigarettes every day.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A record of an individual's background in regard to smoking tobacco.  This would include such factors as start date, end date (if applicable), number of cigarette smoked, attempts to quit, and others._Occurring or done each day.:Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.:The bodily process of taking in and using up something, especially the eating or drinking of something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A record of an individual's background in regard to smoking tobacco.  This would include such factors as start date, end date (if applicable), number of cigarette smoked, attempts to quit, and others.

Concepts.definition: A record of an individual's background in regard to smoking tobacco. This would include such factors as start date, end date (if applicable), number of cigarette smoked, attempts to quit, and others.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring or done each day.:Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.:The bodily process of taking in and using up something, especially the eating or drinking of something.

Concepts.definition: Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.
The bodily process of taking in and using up something, especially the eating or drinking of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 9/28/10 Released for use in caTissue Suite version 1.1 and/or 1.2 per owners direction.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk
